backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing baby crib reservation system with user profiles, services, reservations, loyalty points, and role-based access control using AccessControl and MixinAuthorization modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including ProLogin authentication, NexusOS RADAR/WALLET/PORTFOLIO tabs, Builder screen, and Subscription screen with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing NEXUS app components including routing, context, screens (Splash, Explorer, Booking flow, ProLogin, NexusOS, Builder), and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with NEXUS design system CSS variables for light/dark themes, including color tokens, spacing, and custom properties for UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Google Fonts (Playfair Display italic and Inter 900) and mounting React app to #root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component with AppContextProvider and ScreenRouter implementing animated screen transitions (slide-left/right/fade) between 12 app screens with 300ms duration.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Empty or legacy file with no content (truncated in provided source).
frontend/src/components/BookingContact.t: Booking contact form screen with name/phone/address fields, Swiss phone validation, conditional address requirement for domicile bookings, success toast, and navigation back to Explorer.
frontend/src/components/BookingDate.tsx: Date and time selection component for booking appointments, displaying a 4-day calendar with 30-minute time slots (9:00-19:00), filtering past times and provider-blocked slots, with category-specific gradient backgrounds.
Location selection screen for bookings that allows users to choose between at-home (domicile) or studio service, displaying availability and pricing for each option based on provider configuration.
frontend/src/components/Builder.tsx: Multi-step provider onboarding wizard with 4 steps: basic info (name, category, city), logistics (service modes and studio address), services (name, pricing, duration), and availability (weekly time slots), culminating in subscription flow.
Client dashboard displaying pending and completed reservations with details (provider, service, date/time, location, price) and ability to cancel pending bookings.
frontend/src/components/ClientLogin.tsx: Two-step client authentication flow: phone number entry followed by OTP verification, with a simulated 4-digit code generation displayed via toast notification for demo purposes.
frontend/src/components/Explorer.tsx: Provider discovery screen with category/mode/city filters, geolocation-based sorting, and distance calculation. Displays filtered provider cards and navigates to provider detail on click.
frontend/src/components/NexusOS.tsx: Professional dashboard with tabs for booking requests, weekly agenda management, and portfolio. Handles booking acceptance/refusal, slot blocking/unblocking, and navigation between pro and client modes.
frontend/src/components/ProLogin.tsx: Professional login form with hardcoded demo credentials (pro@nexus.ch / nexus2025). Authenticates and redirects to NexusOS on success, shows toast error on failure.
frontend/src/components/ProviderDetail.t: Provider detail view showing cover photo, services list with pricing, and service selection. Navigates to booking location screen when a service is selected and confirmed.
frontend/src/components/Splash.tsx: Landing screen with hero image, NEXUS branding, and two action buttons: 'EXPLORER' (navigates to explorer) and 'ESPACE PRO' (currently no action).
frontend/src/components/Subscription.tsx: Subscription onboarding screen displaying pricing (free first month, then CHF 49/month), feature list, and a subscribe button that publishes a demo studio and navigates to NexusOS.
frontend/src/context/AppContext.tsx: Defines global app state context with TypeScript types for providers, services, bookings, sessions (client/pro), and screen navigation. Exports AppState interface with all state setters and navigation methods for managing the booking flow and authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance using Internet Identity authentication. Handles actor creation with identity, admin token initialization, and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for ICP integration. Manages login/logout flow, identity persistence, delegation validation, and authentication status with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with NEXUS design system: dark theme (#0a0a0a background), sand accent (#E8D5B0), CSS custom properties, typography classes (Inter 900, Playfair Display italic), button styles (white/sand/dark), and screen transition animations (slide/fade).
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Empty utility file, likely placeholder for future aura/visual effect generation functionality.
frontend/src/utils/haversine.ts: Implements Haversine formula to calculate GPS distance between two coordinates in kilometers, rounded to one decimal place for geolocation features.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence for parameters like admin tokens and ability to clear sensitive params from URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Empty Tailwind configuration file (project uses custom CSS instead of Tailwind per architectural notes).
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking NEXUS mobile-first beauty/wellness booking app for Swiss Romandie. Documents Sprint 1 completion (screens 1-6 with hardcoded data, geolocation, filters) and Sprint 2 progress (authentication, NEXUS OS with 4 tabs, Builder, client dashboard) with no backend integration yet.
